title: send bytes normal to server but failed to read bytes form server
body:
by **lifulinghan@126.com**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?
1.I send some bytes to server by UDPconn and TCPconn,but Success to send and Failed to
read 
2.I tried using the HTTP protocol ,The code is normal
3.I tried using the python rewrite those code,make sure byte package and the server is
normal!


note:
8g on windows,and 6g(and gccgo) on ubuntu11.10
Attachments: 1. qqconnect.go (3943 bytes) 1. qq.py (523 bytes)
